title: Demoted after losing one game at 0LP S1 to S2
body: So I lost a game and that lost brought me down to 0LP in Silver One. I thought I'd give it one more shot and played another game. My adc trolled mid and made herself the new mid lanner and she fed resulting in another lose. After the game in end of game screen it said I had been demoted down to S2... Can someone explain why I was demoted only after losing one game at 0LP???

replies.body: I think there is a cap in each division. 0lp needs to leave if someone promoted in

When you are promoted to your next division, u are given a 10 game immunity from demotion (3 game for master tier and above). Once the player has won "1 GAME" their immunity is withdrawn and if they go back to 0 lp and lose at 0lp they will get demoted to the next division below. Only players with Extremely high mmr, eg earning 20+ lp per win can be saved from getting demoted until the player's mmr earns less than 20 lp per win
But what you don't see is that once you hit 0 LP the first time, you go into an unofficial 'demotion series'. I assume that's where you went L, L, L, W, W, L, L, L, W, L in your Ranked Match History.
Could you elaborate more on this "demotion series"?

"[A particularly bad losing streak may result in dropping a tier or division, though there’s no set number of games that may trigger a demotion. Losing enough games at 0 LP can drop you into the next-highest division](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)." 

If you were recently promoted from silver to to silver 1 you would have had a 3 game shield. By the looks of your match history, you shield would have run out and your MMR would have been low enough to boop you back down to S2.
